thread.title: Nurse charged with stealing painkillers from elderly patients
thread.title_full: Nurse charged with stealing painkillers from elderly patients

title: Nurse charged with stealing painkillers from elderly patients
text:
Published By: Boston.com Local News - Today 
The nurse gave nursing home patients Tylenol, water, and mouthwash in place of the stolen painkillers, said police....
